data.lyric:
[ti:Marry Me]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Life Changes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Marry Me - Thomas Rhett
[00:04.91]Written by：Thomas Rhett/Jesse Frasure/Ashley Gorley/Shane McAnally
[00:09.83]She wants to get married she wants it perfect
[00:14.81]
[00:15.65]She wants her grandaddy preaching the service
[00:20.52]
[00:21.28]Yeah she wants magnolias out in the country
[00:26.11]
[00:26.73]Not too many people save her daddy some money
[00:31.70]
[00:34.18]Ooh she got it all planned out
[00:38.38]
[00:39.75]Yeah I can see it all right now
[00:44.03]
[00:44.57]I'll wear my black suit black tie hide out in the back
[00:50.06]I'll do a strong shot of whiskey straight out the flask
[00:55.65]I'll try to make it through without crying so nobody sees
[01:01.31]Yeah she wanna get married
[01:03.57]
[01:06.32]But she don't wanna marry me
[01:07.90]
[01:11.93]I remember the night when I almost kissed her
[01:17.08]
[01:17.83]Yeah I kinda freaked out we'd been friends forever
[01:22.56]
[01:23.37]And I always wondered if she felt the same way
[01:28.39]
[01:29.00]When I got the invite I knew it was too late
[01:34.27]
[01:35.95]Oh her daddy's been dreading this day
[01:40.31]
[01:41.68]Oh but he don't know he ain't the only one giving her away
[01:46.68]I'll wear my black suit black tie hide out in the back
[01:51.65]
[01:52.16]I'll do a strong shot of whiskey straight out the flask
[01:57.80]I'll try to make it through without crying so nobody sees
[02:03.53]Yeah she wanna get married
[02:05.69]
[02:08.62]But she don't wanna marry me
[02:10.29]
[02:19.99]She got on her dress now welcoming the guests now
[02:24.87]
[02:25.68]I could try to find her get it off of my chest now
[02:30.47]
[02:31.16]But I ain't gonna mess it up so I'll wish her the best now
[02:36.71]
[02:40.11]So I'm in my black suit black tie hiding out in the back
[02:45.32]
[02:45.84]Doing a strong shot of whiskey straight out the flask
[02:51.37]I'll try to make it through without crying so nobody sees
[02:57.08]Yeah she wanna get married
[02:59.27]
[03:02.68]Yeah she gonna get married
[03:04.90]
[03:07.98]But she ain't gonna marry me
[03:09.30]
[03:11.46]Whoa but she ain't gonna marry me no
data.trans:
[ti:Marry Me]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Life Changes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.91]//
[00:09.83]她想要一场完美的婚礼
[00:14.81]
[00:15.65]她想让爷爷做见证人
[00:20.52]
[00:21.28]她想让父老乡亲参加婚礼
[00:26.11]
[00:26.73]大家希望有场奢华盛大的婚礼
[00:31.70]
[00:34.18]她把一切都计划好了
[00:38.38]
[00:39.75]我也全都看出来了
[00:44.03]
[00:44.57]我穿着黑色西装 搭黑色领带 藏在黑暗角落
[00:50.06]我要猛喝一口威士忌
[00:55.65]我要把这些都想清楚 哭也不会让别人看到
[01:01.31]她想要结婚
[01:03.57]
[01:06.32]可她不想嫁给我
[01:07.90]
[01:11.93]我记得那夜晚 我差点吻到她的唇
[01:17.08]
[01:17.83]我有点惊讶 因为我们将永远是朋友
[01:22.56]
[01:23.37]我总在想 她是不是也这样想
[01:28.39]
[01:29.00]当我收到喜帖 就知道一切已晚
[01:34.27]
[01:35.95]她的父亲为了这一天忙忙碌碌
[01:40.31]
[01:41.68]但他不知道 他不是唯一失去她的人
[01:46.68]我穿着黑色西装 搭黑色领带 藏在黑暗角落
[01:51.65]
[01:52.16]我要猛喝一口威士忌
[01:57.80]我要把这些都想清楚 哭也不会让别人看到
[02:03.53]她想要结婚
[02:05.69]
[02:08.62]可她不想嫁给我
[02:10.29]
[02:19.99]她穿着漂亮的婚纱迎接宾客
[02:24.87]
[02:25.68]我要试着找到她 求她嫁给我
[02:30.47]
[02:31.16]但我不能毁掉她的婚礼 我只愿她一切都好
[02:36.71]
[02:40.11]我穿着黑色西装 搭黑色领带 藏在黑暗角落
[02:45.32]
[02:45.84]我要猛喝一口威士忌
[02:51.37]我要把这些都想清楚 哭也不会让别人看到
[02:57.08]她想要结婚
[02:59.27]
[03:02.68]她快要结婚了
[03:04.90]
[03:07.98]可她不是嫁给我
[03:09.30]
[03:11.46]可她 不是要嫁给我
